articles.content: A choir of joyful, experimental, virtuosic Black female voices greets visitors to the British pavilion at the 59th Venice Biennale, the worlds most prominent international art event delayed a year by… [+5583 chars]

articles.author: Fay Leyfield
articles.title: This Morning’s Holly Willoughby fights back tears as Tan France reveals he was beaten up and left for dead... - The Sun
articles.content:
HOLLY Willoughby fought back tears on todays This Morning as TV star Tan France opened up about the horrifying racism he suffered as a child.
Tan, who appeared on the show to talk about his new docu… [+1662 chars]
